text: @RealJamesWoods We know that this Whole Covid-19 scare tactic is about CONTROL AND MONEY!! The ones that want to CONTROL have been against the cure and inflated the death counts. Though they think they are strong. In reality they are the WEAK looking for Strength!! #TRUMP2020 #AMERICAFIRST
